mesquite.lib

Class NumberArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.NumberArray

  • public class NumberArray
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store numbers flexibly, so that system doesn't need to know whether int, long or double. Automatically upgrades to use long or double as needed. This stores a whole array of similarly typed numbers. For single numbers, use NumberObjects instead.

      • placeValue

        public void placeValue(int index,
                       MesquiteNumber n)
        Places the value at array element "index" into the MesquiteNumber n. Used instead of a simple getValue to avoid having to create a MesquiteNumber object.
